### Tender Description

This invitation to tender is for the replacement of the existing Inmate Intercom system at the Dorchester Minimum Institution in Dorchester, New Brunswick. The work includes the design, supply, install, test, train operators and maintenance provider’s on the installed equipment, as described in the Statement of Technical Requirements (STR). Documentation for the operation and maintenance of this equipment must be provided.

A site visit is optional for bidders. Interested bidders must submit their name, company name, email address, and telephone number to the Contracting Authority by email at [joanne.m.ladouceur@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:joanne.m.ladouceur@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) a minimum of five (5) calendar days prior to the site visit.

### Key Dates

* Site visit: October 19, 2022
* Tender closing date: January 10, 2023
* Contract award date: To be determined

### Contracting Authority

Public Works and Government Services Canada is the Contracting Authority for this tender. All inquiries should be directed to [joanne.m.ladouceur@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](
